product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
The banner showcases a clean and elegant layout designed to promote a jewelry product. It features a soft grid-style, four-quadrant background in warm pastel tones divided into pink gradients. A large product image (id: `product_image`) is positioned on the right half, drawing attention to intricately designed earrings. Text elements like the main heading (`heading`), subheading (`subheading`), and item tagline (`tagline`) are aligned on the left for structured hierarchy. A features list (`description`) and bold pricing (`price`) provide product details. A vibrant call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with accompanying text (`cta`) prompts purchasing.

**Color Palette**:  
- Rose Pink: #D2405F  
- Soft Blush: #FFEEF2  
- Light Pink: #FFF5F7  
- Dusty Rose: #F9D5D9  
- Wine: #7E2D3F  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings primarily built around a delicate rose gold frame, beautifully paired with sparkling white gemstones. The dominant color is a soft **rose gold (#EFA2B8)** which adds a luxurious and feminine appeal. The transparent yet reflective white stones have a **cool crystal white (#F8F8FF)** tone, creating a stunning contrast and brilliance against the warmth of the gold. The gemstones are seamlessly embedded into the design, with reflective light playing across their surfaces, enhancing the shine. Subtle shadows of **light blush pink (#FADADD)** and highlights of **peach-pink (#FFC0CB)** blend smoothly, giving a refined, elegant aesthetic.
